answers.answer: These are symptoms of diabetes. Please contact your primary care as soon as possible.Take Care

Hi there.  Welcome.  I agree that the best thing is to see your doctor to go over these symptoms and get to the bottom of them.  some of them are indeed symptoms of diabetes, some could be hormonal.  Seek help to get to the bottom of it.  peace and luck to you
This sounds to me rather like problems with your thyroid or fibrolmyalgia.  My mom's had both and all the symptoms you described for years.  See a neurologist and let them take some tests.
The best thing is to go for a doctor.

question: Hi. I have a few things going on and wondered if anyone can point to what it could be? Symptoms are:- nightsweats / fatigue / weight loss / thristy / stiff neck / the odd fever / abdominal pain.Any ideas?
title: weird sypmtoms
